version_description:
1. Added VIP privileges that bring you more exclusive videos
2. Fixed bugs， improved performance and enhanced the user experience
Bug Fix

1. Optimized UIUE
2. Added social media sharing function, region mode, VIP channel and fuzzy search function
3. Supported Indonesian versions
4. Updated new Chinese and Korean dramas and movies, like ‘Arsenal Military Academy’, ‘When the Devil Calls Your Name’ and ‘Mr. Housework’
5. Improved performance and enhanced the user experience

1. Optimized UI
2. Fixed bug
3. Supported Indonesian, Vietnamese, Bahasa Melayu,Thai versions
4. Updated new Chinese and Korean dramas and movies, like ‘Arsenal Military Academy’, ‘When the Devil Calls Your Name’ and ‘Mr. Housework’
5. Improved performance and enhanced the user experience

1. Added drama schedule
2. Optimized player experiences
3. Optimized UI
4. Fixed bug
5. Supported downloads for VIP members
6. Updated new dramas and movies, like "My Mowcli Boy", "When We Are Together"， "No Way for Stumer" and "Jiang Ziya"

1. Fixed bug
2. Updated new dramas , like "Waiting For You In The Future", "Adventurous Romance"

1. Added video filter function.
2.Optimized user experiences with a slow internet connection.
3.Optimized UI display.
4.Updated new dramas , like "Lucky's First Love", "Ten Years Late","The Eyas", and multiple Korean dramas.
Minor bug fixed.

1. Added email login
2. Optimized video play experience
3. Optimized the display of cast and crew information
4. Optimized VIP channel and UI display
5. Updated new varity shows and dramas, like 'Feel The World', 'More Than Forever', 'Standing In The Time'
Bug fixed

1. Adjusted privacy page
2. Optimized login process
3. Supported new subtitle type
4. Optimized user experience
5. Updated new varity shows and dramas, like 'A Little Thing Called First Love', 'The Untamed: Living Dead', 'Lovely Swords Girl', and 'Hot-blooded Youth'
Bug fixed

1. Live streaming available
2. Added a special offer of Free VIP for binding email address
3. Improved UI design on front page
4. Added top hits
5. Sharing via Line available
6. Added an access to give feedback on subtitles while playing
7. Updated trending shows Once Upon a Time in Lingjian Mountain, The Listener, Sweet Heart and more to discover!
Bug fixed
Bug fixed

1. Updated trending shows "Sword Dynasty" "Fourtry" "Our Shiny Days" and more to discover!
2. Added new login function by using telephone number
3. Added player in portrait mode
4. Improved UI design
5. Added top hits by search
6. Added the hit list on the VIP channel
7. Added a special offer that sending free VIP membership to users who have registered with e-mail address
Bug fixed

1.Update hot drama and variety show“Detective Chinatown", "The Legend of Condor Heroes", "iPartment 5", "Youth With You 2", "Hey Pro My Mountain Girl"
2.Add activity page of Youth With You
3.Optimize the rewards of email registration 
4.Optimize UI and UE 
5.Add subtitle information on the half-screen play page

1. Updated hot drama and variety show "The Great Ruler", “Guardians of the Ancient Oath”, “I've Fallen For You”, “Everyone Wants to Meet You”, “The Love Lasts Two Minds”
2. Added Facebook comments
3. Updated the scanning function 
4. Improved user experiences
5. Added the new function that getting new release reminder by clicking the ‘reminder’ button on the trailer page

1.Update hot drama“Princess At Large 3” “My Lonely Planet” “Danger of Her” “A Piece of Your Mind” “Eccentric! Chef Moon”.
2.Update hot variety show "Youth With You 2": Gathering many young girls with great singing and dancing dreams, let's witness the birth of an extremely popular girl group.
3.Improve user experiences.
Improve user experiences.

1.Update hot drama The Sleuth of Ming Dynasty, Winter Begonia, My Roommate is A Detective, If There is No Tomorrow, Ne Zha, Food Wars!
2.Optimize search function, and the special page for “Youth With You Season 2”
3.Add the voting function for “Youth With You Season 2”

1. Update hot drama "The Sleuth of Ming Dynasty", "My Roommate is a Detective", "Well Intended Love 2", "Born Again", "My Fantastic Mrs Right", "Legend of Awakening", "Love a Lifetime".
2.Update hot variety show "CZR 2 – I’m Singer-Songwriter": Let's enjoy original music.
3.Gold VIP can be used on TV.
4.Preview VIP video.
5. Improve user experiences.

1. Update hot drama “Coffee & Vanilla” “My Sassy Deskmate” “When My Love Blooms” “Oh My Baby” “Spycies”.
2. Live show of "Youth With You Season 2" synchronized multilingual subtitles.

1. Update hot drama “Dinner Mate” “Backstreet Rookie””Love Designer”
2. Optimize payment by Google Pay
3. Improve the video play experience
4. Update the service agreement
Bug fixed
Add the activity page of the Summer Surf Shop

1. Update hot drama The Little Nyonya, Tientsin Mystic 2, Summer Surf Shop and so on
2. The user playback experience is optimized
3. The home page is updated, and new features are added
Bug fixed

1.Update hot drama Dance of the Sky Empire, The Song of Glory, The Big Band 2 and so on
2.Add the Arabic interface
3.Optimize the search experience, and render the target contents in a quicker and accurate way
Bug fixed

1.Update hot content The Rap of China 2020, My Strange Friend, Love Yourself and so on
2.We add the audio mode, with which you can enjoy our programs just for the audio.
3.You can now rate the programs and see the ratings of any program.
4.If you want to see the news of the app, use our new message center.

1.Update hot content The Rap of China 2020, My Strange Friend, Love Yourself and so on
2.We add the audio mode, with which you can enjoy our programs just for the audio.
3.You can now rate the programs and see the ratings of any program.

1.Update hot content The Rap of China 2020, My Strange Friend, Love Yourself and so on
2.We add the audio mode, with which you can enjoy our programs just for the audio.
3.You can now rate the programs and see the ratings of any program.
4.If you want to see the news of the app, use our new message center.
